comment._content: Wednesday, 28 February 1900. Read All About It - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/page/1350761. See notes and comments - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/6151059819/]

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: I am not convinced that a sailing ship was a sensible method of transporting people to south africa.
